name: Custom 1935 Collier's Atlas Vintage Map Drawer Pulls or Cabinet Knobs
description:
inkaarten, from the dutch, "to map" is a new pairing from husband and wife, Bob and Sherry Truitt.

This listing is for:

Four (4) Collier's 1935 Map Drawer Pulls or Cabinet Knob 
You may order 4 different cities on this listing

Your knobs are hand crafted when ordered and your set will be ready to ship in just 12-14 days. We'll send 2 screws for each knob for the perfect fit. Large quantity orders may take three weeks in studio fabrication.


*Don't forget your cities of choice in the "message to seller" box when you check out. It's under your name and address on paypal.


Need a different quantity? Contact us here: sherrytruitt2@gmail.com and we'll set up a custom listing for you.

Inkaarten is a division of sherry truitt studios. Please visit our main website for our  expanded line:  http://sherrytruitt.com

categories.name: map cabinet knobs/ pulls  sets of 2

name: Map Drawer Pulls Handles Knobs Brushed Nickel Custom Cities
description:
This listing is for 1 drawer pull and you may order up to 8 pulls on this listing

inkaarten, from the dutch, "to map" is a new pairing from husband and wife, Bob and Sherry Truitt.

Collier's 1935 Map Drawer Pulls or Cabinet Knobs

Hand crafted map pulls will grace your cabinets, drawers or shelf with style. 

These lovely brushed nickel knobs have an elegant profile and hold a vintage map forever preserved in resin. Your cities of choice will be archivally printed from Collier's 1935 World altases in the colorways shown. The knobs are 1.125" in diameter and about an inch deep.

Each knob is hand crafted when ordered and your set will be ready to ship in just about 2 weeks. We'll send a matching screw for each knob for the perfect fit.

Don't forget your  cities in the "message to seller" when you checkout, please. It's a box right under your name and address on paypal.

Looking for a different quantity? Just let us know and we'll set up a reserved listing for you.

Thanks for stopping by,

Bob and Sherry

Please view the entire collection of knobs in our shop.

In an effort to leave a lighter footprint on the earth, recycled steel is used whenever possible, as well as ecopoxycraftresin© , a 100% solid-based, thermosetting resin made from soybeans, beans and peanuts.

name: Stainless Steel Vintage Map Key Chain Made to Order
description:
For that hard to buy for man or woman in your life.....

A key chain for memories as well as keys. I'll craft you a key chain with a special map nestled in a stately stainless steel 25mm bezel, forever preserved with jeweler's resin and attached to a stainless steel key ring.

Put your city of choice in the "message to seller" box under you name and address on paypal.

Crafted and shipped in just 8 days.

Inkaarten is  a division of sherry truitt studios. Please visit our main website here for additional items:  http://sherrytruitt.com

name: Inkaarten Large Wooden Shelf Mahogany and Pine with Human Anatomy Knobs
description:
inkaarten, from the dutch, "to map" is a new pairing from husband and wife, Bob and Sherry Truitt.
 
A beautifully handcrafted mahogany and pine shelf holds vintage human anatomy woodcut maps. The maps are set in steel knobs forever preserved with resin.
 
The shelf is about 20 inches long and 3.75 inches deep. While the striking design makes this shelf attractive for display, the slim profile makes it a perfect fit behind a door.
 
Finished with amber shellac and natural butcher's wax, the shelf hangs with two key hole style mountings. Hardware and hanging instructions are included.
 
 
The natural characteristics of wood will make each shelf slightly different from the rest. Props not included.
 
Glad you stopped by, 
xoBob and Sherry

In an effort to leave a lighter footprint on the earth, recycled steel is used whenever possible, as well as ecopoxycraftresin© , a 100% solid-based, thermosetting resin made from soybeans, beans and peanuts.
